title: STAT+: As U.S. officials move to reduce animal testing in research, focus may shift to restrictions on imports
description: The Trump administration is seeking to reduce animal testing in research. Some activists are pushing the administration to suspend primate imports for research purposes entirely.
content: The Trump administration is seeking to reduce animal testing in research. Some activists are pushing the administration to suspend primate imports for research purposes entirely.
